title: Broken Finnish language pack
content: How you can make the Mozilla fix the Finnish language pack that checks the grammar and spelling? There is multiple reviews on it that it doesn't work and there has nothing to be done to that on past year. It still doesn't work on today. And since there is only one option that you can use it is really hindering for someone like me who is dyslexic and really needs it. So is there a way to reach the Mozilla team and get them actually fix it?? I know it is just a small country and there aren't that many millions or billions of people using it so there is no priority for it to be fixed but still it would be nice to be able to get it. Specially when google chrome has working one. I just would prefer to use firefox.
creator: viivi.y

title: Autoplay
content: Is it possible to disable autoplay videos on sites like CNN or NBC while still allowing video to be played on demand? I have disallowed autoplay on these sites because they have annoying, intrusive videos on about every single page, but I still *do* sometimes want to watch selected videos. With autoplay disabled, the "play" button in videos does not work, either. As it is, I have been disabling, then re-enabling, the autoplay block before/after watching a video, which sort of works as a work-around, but I'd really like a real solution--one that blocks autoplay but allows play on demand.
creator: seraphblue

title: Latest Update 89.2 is causing all websites to freeze and loading issues
content: Is anyone else noticing a huge difference with websites failing to load, long load times, etc. with 89.2? Just downloaded and installed today and immediately had issues. I can't figure out how to go back to previous version. If anyone knows how to re-install and run previous version please let me know. Thanks.

title: PC vs. Tablet switches randomly
content:
Everytime I go to my bank, it's a crapshoot as to whether it thinks I'm a tablet / phone or a PC. And, I'm using a PC. I can't do things in tablet mode that I can do when I get it to see if I'm a PC. I know I'm screwed when it suggests that I download the app because I can do more there.  :(

And, I am still trying to figure out why, and how I'm able to get it to change it's mind! And, there's no "desktop mode" on the menu anymore, so I can't force it that way. It's really frustrating when I'm trying to reconcile my bank. I can't click on the Cleared button in "tablet" mode. I used to see it on my 360 convertible, and figured it was hardware based. But, now it's a straight laptop, no tablet mode.

Help? --Jan

title: 'change' event for geolocator permission not triggered on change through permissions dialog
content:
navigator.permissions.query({ 

      name: 'geolocation'

}).then(function(result) { 

      result.onchange = function() {          console.log('changed');       };

})

Using the above code, when the location permission dialog shows up in the browser and the value is changed from 'Block'/'Ask by default' to 'Allow', the 'onchange' function or the 'change' event aren't triggered. Essentially when this permission is set by the user using this dialog, I would like to show a message to the user asking them to enable their location to proceed, if blocked.
creator: karan.uday

title: Facebook, Google probably cache problem
content:
Hello everyone! I`m using Firefox for a long time, but the following problem makes is almost impossible to us it anymore:

since a couple of month Facebook stopped working correctly on Firefox, it works for a while, then suddenly everything stopped, does not load anything, nor the page, nor messages... I need to clear the cache of facebook cookies then works for a while again... and then repeat.

It wasn`t a blocker problem with Facebook, but now it does the same with everything related to Google too. I push google button on bookmark, nothing, i push any button on Google (if already opened), nothing... Google docs buttons disappear, google login not works, etc... The same cookie cleaning helps, but i can not do this with google too... I`m logged in to work documents and stuff, can`t just reload everything every 10 minutes....

I use only Addblock Ultimate and Mouse Gestures Event, but tried disabling them without effect on my problem.

Thank you for your input!

title: Forms and Autofill stopped working
content:
I know that the autofill for credit cards is only available in the US and Canada (https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/credit-card-autofill#w_edit-your-saved-credit-cards). I live in the US. The feature was working just fine... until I traveled overseas and used my laptop there and changed time zones to where I was visiting. Now that I'm back in the US, the feature is missing. In the settings, I don't see a "Forms and Autofill" section in the settings. I checked system locale and it's properly set to us-en. All the settings are properly set in about:config. I've tried everything I found by searching online and nothing helped. I even tried creating a separate profile in Firefox to see if the section shows up under setting with no luck.

Any help/suggestions would be greatly appreciated.
